author: J. R. Glenn
content: Defines risk controls for high-yield dividends: keep payout ratios below 85%, cap leverage, monitor interest coverage, and diversify across sectors that can pass through inflation (utilities, consumer staples, REITs). Emphasizes stress-testing each position for revenue declines and dividend cuts before allocation.

author: J. R. Glenn
content: Outlines a filter workflow for high-yield ideas: start with dividend growth >3% YoY, payout ratio <80%, free cash flow coverage, and strong insider ownership. Layer automation that rescans weekly and flags FH yield changes >20 basis points so the income desk can reassess positions quickly.
